metadata.title: CVE-2021-38208 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: net/nfc/llcp_sock.c in the Linux kernel before 5.12.10 allows localunprivileged users to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereferenceand BUG) by making a getsockname call after a certain type of failure of abind call.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
